Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.otplib

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Conversation
    Main access point for library users.
    Cryptor
    Utils class for conversion of messages.
    CryptorException
    Custom Exception definition for generic failure situations throught encryption or decryption.
    EncryptedMessage
    This class represents an encrypted message in form of a map.
    InvalidPartyException
    Custom Exception indicating a privded party was not recognized.
    OneTimePad
    Immutable implementation of One Time Pad object.
    OneTimePadGenerator
    Generator for one time pads.
    OneTimePadMissmatchException
    Custom exception that is used whenever an operation is invoked that attempts to combine encrypted messages with the wrong cryptographic material (the wrong one time pad).
    OutOfChunksException
    This exception is thrown if the library was requested to encrypt a message but, there are not enough remaining chunks in the provided one time pad.
    PadGeneratorException
    Custom Runtime Exception definition.
    PlainMessage
    Plain messages are either created by the library user, for adding a message to the conversation object.
    SerializationTools
    Util class with a single public method that provides Gson object for conventient One Time Pad handling.
